mapper.update:
update users
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
submit = #{submit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
solved = #{solved,jdbcType=INTEGER},
defunct = #{defunct,jdbcType=CHAR},
ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: select *from users where user_id like '%${userId}%' and delete_flag=0
SELECT u.user_id,u.nick,u.submit,u.solved FROM users AS u ORDER BY (u.solved/u.submit) DESC LIMIT #{offSet,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{userNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}
